      // Silence Quarto list.js error if a template injects an empty listing
      document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', () => {
        if (window.List && !window.__listGuardPatched) {
          const OrigList = window.List;
          window.List = function(el, options) {
            const node = (typeof el === 'string') ? document.querySelector(el) : el;
            if (node && !node.querySelector('.list, [data-title], [data-id]')) {
              const ul = document.createElement('ul'); ul.className='list'; ul.style.display='none'; node.appendChild(ul);
            }
            return new OrigList(el, options);
          };
          window.List.prototype = OrigList.prototype;
          window.__listGuardPatched = true;
        }
      });
      </script>
